'''Daionne''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Leader of a band of thugs preying on people passing through the alleyways of Neketaka.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* Randomly encountered during travels through Neketaka, Daionne tries to lure you in with the promise of a figurine, leading to a confrontation.  Killing him earns you the [Battered Dog Figurine](/batteredDogFigurine/).
}}

[Category:Neketaka random encounter characters](/categoryNeketakaRandomEncounterCharacters/)
